item.title: Market Radar – Sept 6, 2025 (Initial Brief)
item.description:
Market Sentiment

Today’s Bias: 80% Bullish — futures green, VIX down, weak jobs report fueling rate-cut hopes.

Weekly Bias: 70% Bullish — CPI/jobs data suggest SPY likely to finish week positive.

Portfolio Watchlist (Personal Account)

MARA: +3.5% pre-market — Bitcoin rally lifting miners.

RIOT: Testing $14 support — bounce entry possible.

BITF: +2.0% — crypto strength continues.

SQQQ: -2.1% — hedge under pressure in bullish market.

Portfolio Watchlist (Roth IRA)

JNJ: $178.09 (+0.5%) — upgraded to Overweight.

XOM: $111.14 (+1.0%) — supported by oil rally.

NEE: $70.69 (-0.3%) — slight pullback with yields up.

SCHD: $27.70 (flat) — yield steady at 3.6%.

COST: $966.95 — earnings next week.

Actionable Playbook

• Favor risk-on (MARA/RIOT).

• RIOT near support for swing entry.

• NEE nearing buy range; staggered entries possible.

• If Powell is dovish → dividend ETFs (SCHD, JEPI, HDV) gain; hawkish tone → utilities pressured.
